message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to cater to your needs. We are offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $2000000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.
